name: summit-security-questionnaire
description: AI-powered security questionnaire application with FastAPI backend and Next.js frontend

scripts.dev:backend: cd backend && python3 -m venv venv && source venv/bin/activate && pip install -r requirements.txt && python start.py
scripts.dev:frontend: cd frontend && npm install && npm run dev
scripts.start:backend: cd backend && source venv/bin/activate && python start.py
scripts.build:backend: cd backend && source venv/bin/activate && echo 'Backend build complete'
scripts.install:all: npm run install:backend && npm run install:frontend
scripts.install:backend: cd backend && python3 -m venv venv && source venv/bin/activate && pip install -r requirements.txt
scripts.setup: npm run install:all && npm run setup:env
scripts.setup:env: echo 'Setting up environment files...' && cp backend/env_template.txt backend/.env && cp frontend/env-template.txt frontend/.env.local && echo 'Environment files created. Please update them with your actual credentials.'
